Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of exercise done being intense (A=1) is 0.4186. 
The probability of diet quality being good (B=1) is 0.1338. 
For those with diet quality being poor (B=0) and amount of exercise done being little (A=0), the probability of weight being overweight (C=1) is 0.4823. 
For those with diet quality being poor (B=0) and amount of exercise done being intense (A=1), the probability of weight being overweight (C=1) is 0.9346. 
For those with diet quality being good (B=1) and amount of exercise done being little (A=0), the probability of weight being overweight (C=1) is 0.3500. 
For those with diet quality being good (B=1) and amount of exercise done being intense (A=1), the probability of weight being overweight (C=1) is 0.8920. 
For those with amount of exercise done being little (A=0), the probability of risk of developing heart disease being low (D=1) is 0.3255. 
For those with amount of exercise done being intense (A=1), the probability of risk of developing heart disease being low (D=1) is 0.6305.
